description: Represents a channel group that facilitates the grouping of multiple channels.

ChannelGroupName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Description.description: Enter any descriptive text that helps you to identify the channel group.
Description.markdownDescription:
